allowDeselect.description: Determines whether user can deselect the date by clicking on selected item, applicable only when type="default"
allowDeselect.description_zh: 确定用户是否可以通过单击所选项目来取消选择日期，仅在 type=“default” 时适用

allowSingleDateInRange.description: Determines whether single year can be selected as range, applicable only when type="range"
allowSingleDateInRange.description_zh: 确定是否可以选择单个年份作为范围，仅在 type=“range” 时适用

ariaLabels.description: Aria-label attributes for controls on different levels
ariaLabels.description_zh: 不同级别控件的 Aria-label 属性

columnsToScroll.description: Number of columns to scroll when user clicks next/prev buttons, defaults to numberOfColumns
columnsToScroll.description_zh: 用户单击下一个/上一个按钮时要滚动的列数，默认为 numberOfColumns

date.description: Date that is displayed, used for controlled component
date.description_zh: 显示的日期，用于受控零部件

decadeLabelFormat.description: Dayjs label format to display decade label or a function that returns decade label based on date value, defaults to "YYYY"
decadeLabelFormat.description_zh: dayjs 标签格式显示十年标签或根据日期值返回十年标签的函数，默认为 “YYYY”

defaultDate.description: Initial date that is displayed, used for uncontrolled component
defaultDate.description_zh: 显示的初始日期，用于非受控零部件

defaultValue.description_zh: 非受控零部件的默认值

getYearControlProps.description: Adds props to year picker control based on date
getYearControlProps.description_zh: 根据日期向年份选取器控件添加 props

locale.description: Dayjs locale, defaults to value defined in DatesProvider
locale.description_zh: Dayjs 区域设置，默认为 DatesProvider 中定义的值

nextLabel.description_zh: 用于下一个按钮的 Arial-label

numberOfColumns.description: Number of columns to render next to each other

onNextDecade.description: Called when next decade button is clicked
onNextDecade.description_zh: 单击下一个十年按钮时调用

onPreviousDecade.description: Called when previous decade button is clicked
onPreviousDecade.description_zh: 单击前十年按钮时调用

type.description: Picker type: range, multiple or default
type.description_zh: 选取器类型：范围、多个或默认

withCellSpacing.description: Determines whether controls should be separated by spacing, true by default
withCellSpacing.description_zh: 确定是否应使用空格分隔控件，默认情况下为 true

yearsListFormat.description: Dayjs format for years list, 'YYYY' by default
yearsListFormat.description_zh: 年份列表的 Dayjs 格式，默认为 'YYYY'
